attributes.action: STOP NICK CLEGG RECEIVING A KNIGHTHOOD
attributes.additional_details: It is disgraceful that he could receive this honour whilst defying the Will of the People of this Country.
attributes.background: Nick Clegg should not receive a Knighthood as he is actively promoting that the UK should stay in the EU, with his book “How to Stop Brexit”, which is completely against the will of the majority of the people who voted to leave the EU on 23rd June 2016.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
